p: We also analyzed the whole genomic diversity and SNPs frequency of SARS-CoV2 in SA, where the phylogenomic reconstruction showed that there was not a clustering by geography ( Figure 4A) but that there is a significant number of SNPs in the ORF1a, S, 3a, 6, 8, and N genes ( Figure 4B). Interestingly, the number of SNPs in the E gene was null.
